environment_variables.COBALT_JOBID: Job ID assigned by the COBALT scheduler
environment_variables.COBALT_NODEFILE: File containing the list of nodes assigned to the job
environment_variables.LD_LIBRARY_PATH: Environment variable specifying the library search path
environment_variables.PATH: Environment variable specifying the executable search path
environment_variables.PYTHONPATH: Environment variable specifying the Python module search path
